processes.name: combined-steps-blue-green
processes.description: Combines all Blue Green Deployment Steps into single process

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
## This is a temporarly path for Helm3 for demo purposes /home/ucd/helm-linux-amd64
## Typically you would want to create a PV and add your Helm3 CLI and update the UCD agent Values.YAML path
##
#####
##### User specified PV containing utilities to be executed by the UCD agent
##### userUtils.executablesPath can list multiple directories, comma separated
##### userUtils:
###### existingClaimName: ""
#####  executablesPath: "."

${p:application/helmpath} version
${p:application/helmpath} list -n ${p:application/app_namespace}
ls -la

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction
